mapper.select: SELECT folder_id , member_id , parent_folder_id , folder_name , depth , seq , created_at FROM folders WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND parent_folder_id IS NULL AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY seq
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM folders WHERE folder_id = #{folderId} AND deleted_at IS NULL) AS result
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(depth), 0) FROM folders WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND parent_folder_id IS NULL
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(seq), 0) FROM folders WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND parent_folder_id IS NULL

SELECT pj.project_id , pj.project_leader_YN FROM project_joins pj INNER JOIN folder_projects fp ON pj.project_id = fp.project_id INNER JOIN folders f ON fp.folder_id = f.folder_id LEFT JOIN folders pf ON f.parent_folder_id = pf.folder_id WHERE (f.folder_id = #{folderId} OR pf.folder_id = #{folderId}) AND pj.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT folder_id , member_id , parent_folder_id , folder_name , depth , seq , created_at FROM folders WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND parent_folder_id = #{parentFolderId} AND deleted_at IS NULL

WITH RECURSIVE FolderHierarchy AS ( SELECT f.folder_id id , f.folder_name title , f.parent_folder_id , f.depth , f.seq FROM folders f WHERE f.parent_folder_id IS NULL AND f.member_id = #{memberId} AND f.deleted_at IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT f.folder_id id , f.folder_name title , f.parent_folder_id , f.depth depth , f.seq FROM folders f INNER JOIN FolderHierarchy fh ON f.parent_folder_id = fh.id WHERE f.member_id = #{memberId} AND f.deleted_at IS NULL ) SELECT fh.id , fh.title , fh.parent_folder_id , fh.depth , fh.seq , COALESCE(( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(p.project_id) FROM projects p INNER JOIN project_joins pj ON p.project_id = pj.project_id AND p.deleted_at IS NULL INNER JOIN folder_projects fp ON p.project_id = fp.project_id AND fp.folder_id = fh.id WHERE pj.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY p.project_name ), null) AS projectIds FROM FolderHierarchy fh GROUP BY fh.id

SELECT p.project_id id , p.project_name title , p.project_description , p.start_at , p.end_at , pj.project_leader_YN , p.created_at , p.deleted_at FROM projects p LEFT JOIN project_joins pj ON p.project_id = pj.project_id WHERE pj.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.project_id NOT IN (SELECT fp.project_id FROM folder_projects fp INNER JOIN folders f ON fp.folder_id = f.folder_id AND f.member_id = #{memberId}) AND p.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.project_name
